Reviews.Title: At last a Super Android 4.0 unlocked smartphone
Reviews.Author: Regi Sylvain
Reviews.Content: This is easily one of the best Android phones in the market today for the following reasons:1.  It has a fairly efficient MTK6572 dual core  processor miles ahead of the Spreadtrum  processor being used in most 4.0  generic phones being sold in the market today by Chinese vendors.2.  The MTK dual core 6572 dual core processor makes the phone fast, and easy to browse.Browsing as well as surfing is a breeze.Easily one of the best processors in the android market.Look for it while buying any phone.3.  Set up couldn’t have been easier. Just insert your unlocked simcard and within seconds it gets registered with the network.I used an AT&T;  unlocked simcard  and everything went smoothly.4.  Make sure to keep the cellular data connection on especially while using MMS which works well with the cellular data connection.5.  The appearance is fairly good and it is lightweight.6.  The  screen resolution is cool and the colors great.7.  The camera takes good pictures especially the back one.8.  Wifi works at super speed9.  Downloading apps is fairly easy no complications with the MTK 6572 dual core processor.10.  Most popular apps are already there.11.  Battery life is fairly good .Overall an excellent buy and highly recommended phone

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: chevy
Reviews.Content: shipped fast before scheduled date great phone came with head phones 2 batteries  phone case screen protector and charger connects to wifi I have had no problems out of it great phone for a great price downloaded all my apps like facebook snapchat instagram and it came with a 4gb memory card and I connected my service with no problems just inserted my sim card and activated the phone!!

Reviews.Title: A 2G phone which performs better than my old 4GLTE
Reviews.Author: saun
Reviews.Content: Received this phone as a gift from my mother a couple of weeks back.Yes it is adverstised as a 2G phone but beats my old 4glte in call qulaity and coverage.Inside my housr I was never able to get more than 2  bars with my iphone (4GLTE).This one getes full bars .So waht if its is edge.It is the signal strength that matters.The phone is good looking with a decent MTk which has a fairly good speed.Set up could not have been easier.Took me 15 seconds to connect to the nework after I inserted the AT&T; simMMS works fine.Wifi range is great >Connectivity no issue.The extra battery was a bonus.Overall a great phone for its price.

Reviews.Title: A2G phone which works better than most 3g androids in the market
Reviews.Author: desmond cruise
Reviews.Content: Yes I am not kidding.My son bought it from Amazon and I got angry with him as yo why he didn't ask me before buying as I wanted to get him a 3G.Boy I was wrong.This 2g phone makes the Chinese knockoff 3Gs look like a joke.Here are some of the greates features I have seen in an android.Awesome receptionGreat downloadsHuge 8 GIGS of RomDecent ramGreat call qualityNice appearanceSuper easy set upOveall super value for money

Reviews.Title: garbbage
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i thought this would have being a good buy but it was a waste of money. batteries dead dead dead.

Reviews.Title: Almost made it.
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: It's a cute phone, but  everytime you are on the phone it keeps dialing out or putting the person on hold. Then after about 2-3 weeks the phone wouldn't charge anymore.

Reviews.Title: Mobile defectuso
Reviews.Author: yilmer augusto gereda omaña
Reviews.Content: good afternoon I am writing to tell you acquired a customizable phone Lightahead ® Unlocked Quadband 3G 2 sim 4.0 Inch Capacitive Touch Screen with Android 4.2.2 mobile smart phone 4GB ROM WIFI MTK 6572 Dual Core Compatible with GSM carriers T-mobile Simple mobile, AT & T etc.. (Pink) and this team really went wrong in the internal memory always says that is full and not allowed to download basic applications, this computer will buy my wife for lei apparently this team was good quality according to their characteristics I feel very frustrated because I wanted to make a invercion went bad and I am from Venezuela and for us to get the dollars is not easy quota internetd shopping is every year. I hope to improve this team and to have no more future people like me feeling bad for purchases

Reviews.Title: no charger
Reviews.Author: patricia howard
Reviews.Content: The charger didnt fit the phone looking for one now to buy for it my daughter liked it but no charger

Reviews.Title: Negative!
Reviews.Author: Kellon Banks
Reviews.Content: It was terrible. I wouldn't encourage anyone to get this phone. It wasn't what I expected AT ALL. Off brand. Bad camera. Couldn't hear during phone calls. Wouldn't let me download apps and then they sent iPhone instruction.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: IDA VAZQUEZ
Reviews.Content: its an ok phone internet runs slow it dosent download apps but it works so its cool i guess ok phone

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone.
Reviews.Author: Quineisha
Reviews.Content: I ignored the negetive reviews.but thank God i could receive my money back.Rated 1 star because u have to in order to write a review.The look of the phone was like a iPhone. But this phone was a waste of my money.couldn't get service on the phone unless I was on the beach.other than that there was an x at the top. The speaker was horrible, can't hear music or calls without wearing headphones. My mom had the same phone her signal was working a lil better but she still couldn't hear well on this phone without the headphones. We returned them,got our money back. I Don't recommend this phone to any one you'll be very pist.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Robertson
Reviews.Content: if i could give it a negative score I would.  The phone would not charge after the first month of use!

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: I just ordered this phone an I have straight talk an I already have the unlimited prepaid card so what I need to know is what Sims card I get

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Gladys clarke
Reviews.Content: Great phone very user friendly.Easy to useI would recommend this product to someone i know/it carries two sim cards

Reviews.Title: very Good!!!
Reviews.Author: Sabina Granado
Reviews.Content: Very good product, I recommend it. Excellent quality, as it says the publication. presentation is very good, the price adjusted.

Reviews.Title: A very unsatisfied customer.
Reviews.Author: Seth Kirkner
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone about 2-3 months ago and i am very disappointed with it. I understand its 2G, but it never wants to load the Google Play Store, GPS, it doesnt connect with my computer at all, and I have a hard time hearing when someone calls. The only reason I keep this phone is because i cant afford to buy another one. I would not recommend this phone at all. Id recommend just to save your money to buy a more recent version of the samsung.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Marcel
Reviews.Content: dont apply too much pressure to the screen or it will fade away. mines did within two weeks of using the phone.

Reviews.Title: Unlock Lightahead Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Baby boy
Reviews.Content: Yes my friend that I got it for in Dominican Republic love it , in fact it the best phone he ever had !

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Brittany M.
Reviews.Content: Bought this in January, 3 months later the charger connection breaks so now I can't charge my phone. I had to lay it a certain way just for it to charge anyway. The headphone connection was always bad, the sound was distorted only when headphones was put in the phone.  It's also very slow and freezes all the time.  It deleted one of my apps and wouldn't let me add it back.  It said that the phone didn't have that much memory left, but when I checked it the phone said it had a lot of memory left.  If your taking pictures outside, the camera is fine, but when your inside with flash, you have to be in a well lighted room.  The front camera sucks! The battery life is fine as long as its on standby, but of course if it's hooked on wifi and you're surfing on the internet the battery will run down faster. I loved this phone at first, but now I see it was just a waste of money.  I would not recommend this phone to ANYONE!!!

Reviews.Title: Lightahead Unlocked Quaband 2 sim 4.0" Capacitive Touch Screen
Reviews.Author: Etta Breault "Celtic music lover"
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use it. Unfortunately, I live in a "blind" spot so I don't get all the benefits. It is a beautiful phone and I know when I move, I will get a lot out of it.

Reviews.Title: CUTE
Reviews.Author: Rose J. "Rosejul"
Reviews.Content: The phone is cute. I took the phone overseas it was good soon I place the sim it was on but it was so slow I was wonder if it was actually 3gplacing call in holdhanging up on callnot reliableI am happy I brought another phone I would not spend my money on it

Reviews.Title: it not what it said it was going to be
Reviews.Author: Rhaine
Reviews.Content: i like it but its just not want i fully wantedits a good phone though, just not what i was looking for

Reviews.Title: waist of money
Reviews.Author: Greta Y.
Reviews.Content: Was not what expected. Hard to understand. The instructions were a tiny piece of paper that you can't understand. I sent mine back. Did not like!

Reviews.Title: Good delivery
Reviews.Author: Aura
Reviews.Content: Great delivery time and shape.  Phone looked brand new.  Quality of phone okay kindda slow on internet and apps low space needs extra sim storage

Reviews.Title: Not a good choice for AT&T; users!!!!
Reviews.Author: KATHERINE ZEIGLER
Reviews.Content: The call reception is not as good as I thought. It makes a funny noise through out the conversation. Other than that the phone is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Cute Phone
Reviews.Author: L C Jackson
Reviews.Content: This would be a great first phone for a young person. I loved it but i need a 4G because of my plan.

Reviews.Title: SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Had the worst luck with this phone. Took me an hour to get the SIM working in it. Then I could barely hear people when they talked to me. It would put smiley faces when I back spaced on texts. I was very disappointed. Sending this phone back!

Reviews.Title: wow!
Reviews.Author: Emily H.
Reviews.Content: Great easy phone to use! Its like the galaxy phones from samsung. I bought two of them and got them at my front door the next day! Thank you! Im just wondering if I need a micro SIM card or a regular SIM card?

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this phone
Reviews.Author: Christine Magao
Reviews.Content: This was money wastage. I could download apps like whatapps,tango and viber. Why a 3G with no internal memory. Trash..

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: cln85
Reviews.Content: While this phone appears to work amazing for some people, it worked horribly for me. Maybe some are defective? It looks great and has a great feel, so I was excited. Once I got the SIM card in and set up, I realized I wasn't going to get anything better than Edge network speeds :(I tried several APN settings, but all I got was Edge. I called Straight Talk and they said it was set up right, otherwise I wouldn't have any internet. The volume of the calls is horrible and has bad quality. Also, the screen wouldn't black out during calls, so pushing buttons with my face was also an issue. Speaker phone hardly worked. Ringtone is terribly quiet, even on the loudest setting. Very disappointing. I will be returning this phone for sure.
